channel.title: Posts on Causal ML with DoubleML
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Causal ML with DoubleML

item.title: Welcome, Tools for Causality
item.description: Tools for Causality - Double Machine Learning Welcome to the DoubleML course in the “Tools for Causality” school taking place in Autrans/Grenoble (FR) on September 25 to 29, 2023. On this website you’ll find all materials that are used during the tutorial. We will share the materials with participants here just before the tutorial starts. Day 1: Basics of Double Machine Learning Introduction to Causal Machine Learning and Double Machine Learning, Slides Introduction to Causal Machine Learning with DoubleML for Python Slides Heterogeneous Treatment Effects with DoubleML Slides Shiny app Key Ingredients of Double Machine Learning Notebook Uplift modeling Day 2: Sensitivity Analysis and Advanced Methods

item.title: Welcome, uai2022!
item.description: Double Machine Learning: Causal Inference based on ML Welcome to the uai2022 tutorial “Double Machine Learning: Causal Inference based on ML” taking place in Eindhoven and virtually on August 1st, 2022 from 1:30pm to 3:30pm (UTC + 2). On this website you’ll find all materials that are used during the tutorial. We will share the materials with participants here just before the tutorial starts. The tutorial is split into four parts:

item.title: Welcome UseR!2022
item.description: Causal Machine Learning with DoubleML Welcome to the UseR!2022 tutorial “Causal machine learning with DoubleML” taking place virtually on June 20, 2022 from 4:00 to 7:30am CDT. On this website you’ll find all materials that are used during the tutorial. We will share the materials with participants here just before the tutorial starts. The tutorial is split into four parts: Introduction to Double Machine Learning Slides, Speaker notes Shiny app Key Ingredients of Double Machine Learning Introduction to the DoubleML Package for R Slides, Speaker notes Demand Elasticity Notebook (.
